attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Being a nation of hoarders we still have dozens of disused barracks, tons of old uniforms and hundred of eager and recently discharged serviceman who would jump at the chance to sort out the youth army that is controlling our streets and ultimately nation.

Bring back National Service of 15 to 18 months.  Option of Military or Civil Service. Pay wages instead of Benefits.
Option of Jail or Military for criminal convictions.

Every OAP, veteran, victim and decent person would vote.

Support for stretched Military home and abroad.  Support for hospitals and homes.

Support for national emergencies like flooding.

Anyone interested in forming a commitee to organise this nationally.

Please contact.

Lets put the respect and respectability back into Great Britain. Now.

Get rid of the mothballs and let youth get some in.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
